flawed_nl_solution:
The amount in taxes Dorothy needs to pay is 9/50 * 60000 = $<<9/50*60000=108000>>108000.
So she is going to be left with 60000 - 108000 = $<<60000-108000=-48000>>-48000.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 10800, not 108000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
